properties.areaDesc: Pope, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY; Livingston, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:01PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Golconda

.Runoff from recent heavy rain combined with additional forecast rain
will cause minor flooding to develop on the Ohio River at Golconda.
The river is forecast to reach flood stage Friday and crest near 43.3
feet Friday, February 21.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at Golconda.
* from Friday afternoon until further notice.
* At  7:00 PM Tuesday the stage was 37.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 43.3 feet by Friday, February 21. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
